post.body: All bets were off once you invited @jason_wcmh without asking me. You aren't getting your stuff back.
GRRRRRR I was alone thank you very much!
hey hey hey be nice! I just woke up a little while ago.
Kato you yellow dog...
Yeah but I'll break something soon enough
oh man... I was up until 4am... I can't get moving!! HUGS and Smooches help though!!!
SMMMOOOOOOOOOCHHHHH!!!
Oh goody!!! I'm working on some things to get that
It's going well so far. I haven't done anything yet so nothing is broken!
not yet. I'm still trying to wake up. I will be shortly.
Good morning you devil
Hee hee hee smooch!!
Good morning! Did you enjoy your mint?
Good morning!!!
Looking forward to meeting you as well!
Yeah I figured. I was up until 4am for work and just knew I wouldn't make it out of bed. BLAH.
goodnight!!
how old is your mom?
missed ya today!
get them both. ;)
I know. His gun was jammed!
it's not funny! It hurt!
you make me happy too! How have you been?
awww dangit when the blue cross alarm went off I jumped and bent my wookie. That was my only one!
LOL she was cute and outgoing. Did some portraits of her.
can we swing by the cantina? I think I left my droids there and my wallet.
that is one thing that keeps me from coming down on his head. His talking to you. Otherwise blammo.
no way. He just sits there and listens to scanners and watches tv.
have any fun weekend plans?
Me too! Friday couldn't get here soon enough for me!
Have a burger for me!
My apologies. My restore disk is for an intel macbook pro that was purchased over a year ago. Worth a try I would guess
I do. I live there.
Hi there!!! Hope you had a good day!
My avatar beats both yours and @klab's
oh fine don't call me then. :D
I'm on AT&T we have a family plan here. Its free for us to call each other if you get AT&T. :D
Or Captain and Tennille
Interesting perhaps we should introduce them to each other
I don't doubt that a bit. Did you save any for me?
Hmmm wonder if I could hit both of these in one night :D
Indeed you are!
Totally!!! How did you figure that out?
Oh yeah love the chicken teryaki! Day is going well staying busy. How is yours?
Sure! What would you like?
Somewhat stable for the moment at least at the ole day job. We are about to go into a production freeze so it gets dull
I have four Padron Cigars sitting here waiting to be smoked.
I stalk everybody. Just ask around on twitter. They don't call me Creeper for nothing
I'll give you some suggestions on how to market yourself. Street corners are very popular.
weak? I am iron man for having to deal with you.
LOL My typing fingers aren't working this morning. I'm scared cause I have to go out shopping... yikes.
ewwww mwah ewwwww
MWAH!!!:D
MWAH!!!:C
I'm not 100% certain yet. Kiss me and find out. :D
Liar. That's not how you felt Saturday night.
One of my clients babies. They were in for portraits and picked up their Christmas order
Love that avatar!!!!
No just one of my clients babies. Thought he was adorable.
Dude I stalk everybody. I'm like Santa.
I had to put down my twitter crack pipe so I could get some christmas orders done.
Don't worry. I'm always looking out for you
Indeed I do... perhaps I'll post an ultra cute baby picture just for you!
Oh people like @cherylharrison? But she is close to you so I will have to shield you from her awfulness.
Me instigate? Never! <long evil laugh>
Happy birthday! Thanks for inviting me to the party!
RT @redwhiteandnews: Household spending set to drop by biggest amount since attack on Pearl Harbor The good news: we get to nuke Japan again
Now I will collapse. Good night all.
VMware clone is complete for offshore developer. That makes 515 virtual machines in my environment. I'm a machine myself. VMware VI FTW
Coworker was able to complete his Platespin Powerconvert p2p migrations will a little help from me. Glad to have that finished.
hmmm @jason_wcmh ignores me when I talk to him.
hee hee I met a girl named January today...
I'm scanning luns. I bet you're jealous.
Wow no takers on meeting up for some drinks after work? I thought the tweeps were more entertaining than that! :-)
Munching on a pizza sub from Subway
Ok Columbus tweeps who wants to meet up for some frosty beverages this evening at The Winking Lizard? So far a few tweeps are on board
Hey Twitter friends... no not dead. Yet. Just trying to get all kinds of orders out the door in time for Christmas!!! LOL
Thanks for all the picture comments!
http://twitpic.com/umgu - Super cute picture to make everybody feel good today.
Hey what is this twitter thing all about? Learning how to use it today...
